mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collection (user_id, name, type, description, author, cover_image, created_at, updated_at, parent_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{description}, #{author}, #{coverImage}, NOW(), NOW(), #{parentId})
mapper.update: UPDATE collection SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, author = #{author}, cover_image = #{coverImage}, updated_at = NOW(), parent_id = #{parentId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM collection WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM collection WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collection_item (collection_id, file_id, order_index, item_type, metadata) VALUES (#{collectionId}, #{fileId}, #{orderIndex}, #{itemType}, #{metadata})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM collection_item WHERE collection_id = #{collectionId} ORDER BY order_index ASC
